title: Score AQoL-6D (Adolescent) Health Utility
text: derive health utility score raw responses multi-attribute utility instrument necessary implement scoring algorithm. Scoring algorithms Assessment Quality Life Six Dimension (AQoL-6D) publicly available SPSS format (https://www.aqol.com.au/index.php/scoring-algorithms). However, include scoring algorithms reproducible research workflows, desirable algorithms available open science languages R. therefore developed R implementation adult adolescent versions AQoL-6D scoring algorithms made available part scorz package.

title: Score AQoL-6D (Adolescent) Health Utility
text: begin, ingest unscored dataset instance Ready4useDyad class (ready4use package). case download data remote repository. make ingested dataset easier interpret, can add labels dictionary. can now inspect ingested dataset using exhibit method. Dataset now add meta-data identifies dataset longitudinal using YouthvarsSeries class youthvars package. now use data meta-data created previous steps create instance ScorzAqol6Adol class. class specifically designed facilitate scoring adolescent version AQoL-6D instrument. default, instances ScorzAqol6Adol class created slot specifying value prefix AQoL-6D questionnaire item responses. default value needs updated match prefix used dataset, use renewSlot method.
code: X <- ready4use::Ready4useRepos(dv_nm_1L_chr = "fakes",                                dv_ds_nm_1L_chr = "https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/W95KED",                                dv_server_1L_chr = "dataverse.harvard.edu") %>%   ingest(fls_to_ingest_chr = "ymh_clinical_dyad_r4",          metadata_1L_lgl = F) X <- X %>%   renew(type_1L_chr = "label") exhibit(X,         display_1L_chr = "head",          scroll_box_args_ls = list(width = "100%")) X <- youthvars::YouthvarsSeries(a_Ready4useDyad = X,                                 id_var_nm_1L_chr = "fkClientID",                                 timepoint_var_nm_1L_chr = "round",                                 timepoint_vals_chr = levels(X@ds_tb$round)) Y <- ScorzAqol6Adol(a_YouthvarsProfile = X) procureSlot(Y,             slot_nm_1L_chr = "itm_prefix_1L_chr") ## [1] "aqol6d_q" # Not run # Y <- renewSlot(Y, slot_nm_1L_chr = "itm_prefix_1L_chr", new_val_xx = "new_prefix")

title: Score AQoL-6D (Adolescent) Health Utility
text: calculate AQoL 6D adolescent utility scores, use renew method.

title: Score AQoL-6D (Adolescent) Health Utility
text: can inspect updated dataset using exhibit method. can see updated dataset now additional variables include intermediate final calculations AQoL-6D adolescent utility scores. Dataset

title: Score AQoL-6D (Adolescent) Health Utility
text: create plots, use depict method. can create list summary plots timepoint individual items. can select desired item’s summary plot using index number. AQoL-6D Item 1 scores data-collection round Alternatively, can generate individual plots passing item index number var_idcs_int argument depict. AQoL-6D Item 2 scores data-collection round can also plot domain scores time. AQoL-6D Independet Living Domain weighted scores data-collection round Total AQoL-6D scores can also plotted using approach, var_idcs_int = 1L used plot weighted total distribution var_idcs_int = 2L used plotting unweighted total. AQoL-6D item total weighted scores data-collection round Composite plots can generated well, though currently optimised reliably produce quality plots suitable publication. AQoL-6D item responses data-collection round AQoL-6D weighted domain scores data-collection round
code: plot_ls <- depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "item_by_time") plot_ls[[1]] ## Warning: `stat(width * density)` was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. ## ℹ Please use `after_stat(width * density)` instead. ## ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the youthvars package. ##   Please report the issue to the authors. depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "item_by_time", var_idcs_int = 2L) depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "domain_by_time", var_idcs_int = 1L) depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "total_by_time", var_idcs_int = 1L) depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "comp_item_by_time") depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "comp_domain_by_time") ## Warning: The dot-dot notation (`..density..`) was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. ## ℹ Please use `after_stat(density)` instead. ## ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the youthvars package. ##   Please report the issue to the authors.

title: Score AQoL-6D (Adolescent) Health Utility
text: can now publicly share scored dataset associated metadata, using Ready4useRepos share method described vignette ready4use package. Y now available download file ymh_ScorzAqol6Adol.RDS “Documentation_0.0” release scorz package.
code: Z <- ready4use::Ready4useRepos(gh_repo_1L_chr = "ready4-dev/scorz", # Replace with details of your repo.                                gh_tag_1L_chr = "Documentation_0.0") # You must have write permissions. Z <- share(Z,            obj_to_share_xx = Y,            fl_nm_1L_chr = "ymh_ScorzAqol6Adol")

title: Score EQ-5D Health Utility
text: eq5d package provides toolkit scoring EQ-5D health utility. scorz package contains class methods integrate eq5d package tools designed use ready4 youth mental health systems model.

title: Score EQ-5D Health Utility
text: begin, ingest unscored dataset data dictionary Ready4useDyad. add additional details dataset (unique identifier data-collection round variable name values) converting ingested data (YouthvarsSeries)[https://ready4-dev.github.io/youthvars/articles/V_02.html] instance. now use data meta-data created previous steps create instance ScorzEuroQol5 class. Important arguments specify creating ScorzEuroQol5 instance country_1L_chr (country preference weights use), instrument_version_1L_chr (instrument version) itm_var_nms_chr (item variable names - must exact order corresponds Movement, Self-care, Usual Activities, Pain/Discomfort Anxiety Depression domains).
code: X <- ready4use::Ready4useRepos(dv_nm_1L_chr = "fakes",                                dv_ds_nm_1L_chr = "https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/W95KED",                                dv_server_1L_chr = "dataverse.harvard.edu") %>%   ingest(fls_to_ingest_chr = "ymh_eq5d_dyad_r4",          metadata_1L_lgl = F)  X <- youthvars::YouthvarsSeries(a_Ready4useDyad = X,                                 id_var_nm_1L_chr = "uid",                                 timepoint_var_nm_1L_chr = "Timepoint",                                 timepoint_vals_chr = unique(X@ds_tb$Timepoint)) Y <- ScorzEuroQol5(a_YouthvarsProfile = X,                    country_1L_chr = "UK",                    instrument_version_1L_chr = "5L",                    itm_var_nms_chr = c("eq5dq_MO", "eq5dq_SC", "eq5dq_UA", "eq5dq_PD", "eq5dq_AD"))

title: Score EQ-5D Health Utility
text: calculate EQ-5D adolescent utility scores, use renew method.

title: Score EQ-5D Health Utility
text: can inspect updated dataset using exhibit method. Dataset

title: Score EQ-5D Health Utility
text: create plots, use depict method, supplying index number dimension wish plot. EQ-5D Anxiety / Depression Dimension scores time Total EQ-5D scores can also plotted using approach, var_idcs_int = 1L used plot weighted total distribution. EQ-5D total weighted utility scores time composite plot can also generated. EQ-5D weighted domain scores time
code: depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "domain_by_time", var_idcs_int = 5L) ## Warning: `stat(width * density)` was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. ## ℹ Please use `after_stat(width * density)` instead. ## ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the youthvars package. ##   Please report the issue to the authors. depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "total_by_time", var_idcs_int = 1L) depict(Y, type_1L_chr = "comp_domain_by_time") ## Warning: The dot-dot notation (`..density..`) was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. ## ℹ Please use `after_stat(density)` instead. ## ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the youthvars package. ##   Please report the issue to the authors.

title: Score EQ-5D Health Utility
text: can now publicly share scored dataset associated metadata, using Ready4useRepos share method described vignette ready4use package. Y now available download file ymh_ScorzEuroQol5.RDS “Documentation_0.0” release scorz package.
code: Z <- ready4use::Ready4useRepos(gh_repo_1L_chr = "ready4-dev/scorz", # Replace with details of your repo.                                gh_tag_1L_chr = "Documentation_0.0") # You must have write permissions. Z <- share(Z,            obj_to_share_xx = Y,            fl_nm_1L_chr = "ymh_ScorzEuroQol5")

title: Score Ready4 Model Datasets
text: Tools summarise questionnaire responses single index measure datasets used ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://www.ready4-dev.com/). main motivation package facilitate automated scoring, using published publicly available scoring algorithms, measures relevant mental health systems models. development version scorz package made available part process testing documenting package. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au). install development version software, run following commands R console:

title: ScorzAqol6 — ScorzAqol6-class
text: dataset metadata support implementation AQoL-6D scoring algorithm.

title: ScorzAqol6 — ScorzAqol6-class
text: a_YouthvarsProfile (instance YouthvarsProfile class) country_1L_chr Country (character vector length one) domain_unwtd_var_nms_chr Domain unweighted variable names (character vector) domain_wtd_var_nms_chr Domain weighted variable names (character vector) instrument_dict_r3 Instrument dictionary (ready4 S3) instrument_nm_1L_chr Instrument name (character vector length one) instrument_short_nm_1L_chr Instrument short name (character vector length one) instrument_version_1L_chr Instrument version (character vector length one) itm_labels_chr Item labels (character vector) itm_prefix_1L_chr Item prefix (character vector length one) scrg_dss_ls Scoring datasets (list) total_wtd_var_nm_1L_chr Total weighted variable name (character vector length one) total_unwtd_var_nm_1L_chr Total unweighted variable name (character vector length one) dissemination_1L_chr Dissemination (character vector length one)

title: ScorzAqol6Adult — ScorzAqol6Adult-class

what: scorz: Score Ready4 Model Datasets — scorz-package
title: scorz: Score Ready4 Model Datasets — scorz-package
text: Tools summarise questionnaire responses single index measure datasets used ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://www.ready4-dev.com/). main motivation package facilitate automated scoring, using published publicly available scoring algorithms, measures relevant mental health systems models. development version scorz package made available part process testing documenting package. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au).  Tools summarise questionnaire responses single index measure datasets used ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://www.ready4-dev.com/). main motivation package facilitate automated scoring, using published publicly available scoring algorithms, measures relevant mental health systems models. development version scorz package made available part process testing documenting package. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au).
